import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import React from 'react' import Modal from 'react-modal'; import './createFlow.css' import useGlobalState from "../../../Store_&_State/GlobalState" function CreateFlow(prop) { const [description, setDescription] = useState(""); const [stream, setStream] = useState(""); const [credit, setCredit] = useState(""); const [debit, setDebit] = useState(""); const [savedTransaction, setSavedTransaction] = useState( ''); const {createFlowModalIsOpen, setCreateFlowIsOpen} = useGlobalState([]); const [selectColor, setSelectColor] = useState("gray"); if (createFlowModalIsOpen){ prop.blur(8) } function afterOpenModal() { // references are now sync'd and can be accessed. } function closeModal(e) { e.preventDefault(); setCreateFlowIsOpen(false); prop.blur(0) } const create_Flow = () => { } useEffect( () => { if(savedTransaction == ''){ setSelectColor("gray") console.log(savedTransaction) }else{ setSelectColor("gray") console.log(savedTransaction) } },[] ) // console.log(selectColor) console.log(savedTransaction) return (
